    • Field Detail

      • _retainGraphDerivativesAfterBackward

        public static boolean _retainGraphDerivativesAfterBackward
        After backward passes the used derivatives are usually not needed. For debugging purposes however this flag remains and will not allow for garbage collection of the used derivatives.

      • _RetainPendingErrorForJITProp

        public static boolean _RetainPendingErrorForJITProp
        This fla enables an optimization technique which only applies gradients as soon as they are needed by a tensor (the tensor is used again). If the flag is set to true then error values will accumulate whenever it makes sense. This technique however uses more memory but will improve performance for some networks substantially. The technique is termed JIT-Propagation.

      • _applyGradientUntilTensorIsUsed

        public static boolean _applyGradientUntilTensorIsUsed
        Gradients will automatically be applied to tensors as soon as they are being used for calculation. This feature works well with JIT-Propagation.

    • Constructor Detail

        public AD()
